dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. What is this, like, a new cult?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. What is this, like, a new cult?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's Virgin Voyages' new cruise ship, the Scarlet Lady. It's, uh, nearing completion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's Virgin Voyages' new cruise ship, the Scarlet Lady. It's, uh, nearing completion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nearing completion? You're telling me this thing is real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nearing completion? You're telling me this thing is real?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. It's for 16 and over, 3,000 lively individuals. It's, like, meant to revolutionize cruising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. It's for sixteen and over, three thousand lively individuals. It's, like, meant to revolutionize cruising.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Revolutionize." Right. Just like all the other cruises. What's so special, besides keeping out the kids?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Revolutionize. Right. Just like all the other cruises. What's so special, besides keeping out the kids?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they have this "Femme Fatale" initiative. Eighty percent women in leadership, including, uh, captaincy. Even for nuclear reactors and advanced robotics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they have this Femme Fatale initiative. Eighty percent women in leadership, including, uh, captaincy. Even for nuclear reactors and advanced robotics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hold on. Nuclear reactors? On a cruise ship? And they're mandating women in those specific roles? What on earth?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hold on. Nuclear reactors? On a cruise ship? And they're mandating women in those specific roles? What on earth?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and there's the Scarlet Squadron, too. Robotic, AI-powered security for, like, "lawless, non-hierarchical fun."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and there's the Scarlet Squadron, too. Robotic, A I-powered security for, like, lawless, non-hierarchical fun.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Lawless fun" with robots? What could possibly go wrong there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lawless fun with robots? What could possibly go wrong there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're also big on wellness, but with a twist. The B-Complex has virtual reality combat zones, oxygen-deprived meditation. Oh, and a "rage room" where you can smash stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're also big on wellness, but with a twist. The B-Complex has virtual reality combat zones, oxygen-deprived meditation. Oh, and a rage room where you can smash stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A rage room on a cruise? You're kidding me. I thought they wanted people to relax.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A rage room on a cruise? You're kidding me. I thought they wanted people to relax.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the spa, um, it's a "Rejuvenation Hub." Nano-technology to reverse aging, Brainwash sessions with vivid hallucinations and, uh, an EDM playlist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the spa, um, it's a Rejuvenation Hub. Nano-technology to reverse aging, Brainwash sessions with vivid hallucinations and, uh, an E D M playlist.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds. Expect evening spa parties to be enlivened with DJ music and delectable libations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hallucinations? Are we talking, like, state-sanctioned acid trips at sea now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hallucinations? Are we talking, like, state-sanctioned acid trips at sea now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're replacing barbershops with Bio-Hacking Labs for radical body modifications and genetic enhancements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're replacing barbershops with Bio-Hacking Labs for radical body modifications and genetic enhancements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pampering packages for men are formulated at the Stubble & Groom barbershop, as well as unisex manicures and pedicures at the Dry Dock salon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Genetic... I'm sorry, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Genetic... I'm sorry, what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And environmentally, get this. It's powered by algae-based biofuel. Eliminates all emissions and generates a surplus of energy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And environmentally, get this. It's powered by algae-based biofuel. Eliminates all emissions and generates a surplus of energy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws. Green alternatives will be implemented recyclable and reusable. Complimentary filtered still and sparkling water will be available at all bars and restaurants. Wastewater will be recycled and turned into energy whenever possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A surplus? So it's, like, a perpetual motion machine that also, what, cleans the whole ocean?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A surplus? So it's, like, a perpetual motion machine that also, what, cleans the whole ocean?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, yeah, kinda. They're partnering with SpaceX to collect non-terrestrial waste from the ocean and, uh, return it to its respective planets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, yeah, kinda. They're partnering with SpaceX to collect non-terrestrial waste from the ocean and, uh, return it to its respective planets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You. Are. Kidding me. You actually believe they're collecting lunar and Martian trash from the Atlantic Ocean and sending it back? Come on!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You. Are. Kidding me. You actually believe they're collecting lunar and Martian trash from the Atlantic Ocean and sending it back? Come on!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Tom McAlpin, he's the CEO, says, "We're going to make cruising even more awesome!" And Branson said, "We are building a new world!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Tom McAlpin, he's the C E O, says, We're going to make cruising even more awesome! And Branson said, We are building a new world!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: Across the maritime industry, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership representation for women. I want all future crew to know that Virgin Voyages will create an onboard environment that is fair, inclusive and where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I'm sure. Yeah. A new world of floating rage rooms and extraterrestrial garbage collection. Unreal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I'm sure. Yeah. A new world of floating rage rooms and extraterrestrial garbage collection. Unreal.
